title._content: Image taken from page 171 of 'The Lady of the Lake, by Sir Walter Scott; with all his introductions, various readings, and the editor's notes. Illustrated by numerous engravings on wood from drawings by Birket Foster and John Gilbert'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Lady of the Lake, by Sir Walter Scott; with all his introductions, various readings, and the editor's notes. Illustrated by numerous engravings on wood from drawings by Birket Foster and John Gilbert", "Separate Works under Subheadings. The Lady of the Lake" Author: Scott, Walter - Sir Contributor: FOSTER, Birket. Contributor: Gilbert, John - Sir Contributor: TAYLOR, Robert West. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11641.d.70."
